dialogs.title: Use notes_debug: press Confirm
dialogs.message:
Storage is full.
To continue entering text, Notes_debug must remove a large number of temporary cache files.
NEXT STEPS:
• A system file manager will open
• You will see a message like "Delete many items"
• This is expected and SAFE (only cache files)
• Tap OK to complete cleanup and return to Notes_debug
Tap OK now to proceed.
